sqlMap.update: insert into tuition( tu_no, tu_Tut, tu_Stdnt_No )values( tu_seq.nextval, #tu_Tut#, #tu_Stdnt_No# )
update tution set tu_Pay_Dt = #tu_Pay_Dt# where tu_No=#tu_No#
sqlMap.select: select sit_Subjct, tu_Tut, tu_Dt, (tu_Dt+7) as tu_Dt_L, tu_Pay_Dt from tuition t, SUBJCT_INFO_TABLE j, stdnt s where s.st_subjct_code = j.sit_subjct_code and t.TU_STDNT_NO = s.st_stdnt_no and tu_Stdnt_No=#tu_Stdnt_No# and to_char(tu_Dt) like '%'||#tu_Dt#||'%' order by tu_no desc

select count(*) from tuition t, SUBJCT_INFO_TABLE j, stdnt s where s.st_subjct_code = j.sit_subjct_code and t.TU_STDNT_NO = s.st_stdnt_no and tu_Stdnt_No=#tu_Stdnt_No# and to_char(tu_Dt) like '%'||#tu_Dt#||'%' order by tu_no desc
select * from stdnt st, SUBJCT_INFO_TABLE sj, tuition tu where st.ST_SUBJCT_CODE = sj.SIT_SUBJCT_CODE and tu.TU_STDNT_NO = st.ST_STDNT_NO and $key$ like '%'||#value#||'%' order by tu_no desc
select * from tuition where tu_Pay_Dt is null and $key$ like '%'||#value#||'%' order by tu_no desc
